alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 5:19AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...BLACK ICE LIKELY ON ROADWAYS IN PARTS OF SUFFOLK COUNTY EARLY THIS MORNING... An onshore flow of moist maritime air over cold ground has resulted in the development of fog mainly in and near pine barrens and south shore areas of Suffolk County, where air temperatures are at or below freezing, and ground temperatures are likely a little colder. Black ice is likely to develop and cause hazardous driving conditions. Use extreme caution when driving early this morning. These conditions should improve between 8 AM and 9 AM as temperatures rise.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
